Articles.Content:
I do not know if this was already discussed before, however someone in the German subforum asked about it.

Anyone has some information if KSP will get translated into other languages? Also is it possible to do it at all with the current engine?

I guess it could open also some new markets for KSP. Does Squad need help from the community to translate it?
You might want to check this slightly aged thread. There sure were such efforts before and localization is very likely planned, except for late stages of the project.
